extends java.lang.Object

      static boolean haveNetworkConnection(android.content.Context context)
      Checks for network connectivity either via wifi or cellular.
      static boolean haveNetworkConnection2(android.content.Context context)
      This checks the system-side for network connectivity, then pings the google server to make sure they have internet connection.

    • Method Detail

      • haveNetworkConnection

        public static boolean haveNetworkConnection(android.content.Context context)
        Checks for network connectivity either via wifi or cellular.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity doing the checking
        Returns:
        A Boolean. True if they have connection, false if they do not

      • haveNetworkConnection2

        public static boolean haveNetworkConnection2(android.content.Context context)
        This checks the system-side for network connectivity, then pings the google server to make sure they have internet connection. It is slightly slower and is only included here in case the previous haveNetworkConnection code gets completely deprecated.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to be passed
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean, true if they have internet, false if they do not.

      • haveNetworkConnection3

        public static boolean haveNetworkConnection3(android.content.Context context)
        This checks the system-side for network connectivity, then pings the google server to make sure they have internet connection. One other method avail here for use in checking via ConnectivityManager.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to be passed
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean, true if they have internet, false if they do not.

      • clearCookies

        public static void clearCookies(android.content.Context context)
